articles.author: Emma Roth
articles.title: Mt. Gox: all the news on Bitcoin’s original biggest bankruptcy scandal
articles.description: One of the strangest stories in crypto still isn’t over. Mt. Gox went bankrupt in 2014 after losing track of more than 650,000 Bitcoins through theft or mismanagement and its CEO was arrested. But the story didn’t end there.
articles.content:
Filed under:
ByJacob Kastrenakes, a deputy editor who oversees tech and news coverage. Since joining The Verge in 2012, hes published 5,000+ stories and is the founding editor of the creators desk. … [+17914 chars]
